name: PushLoyaltyPrograms_Async
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Api` with functionality `PushLoyaltyProgram:None`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-BackendSystemID
headers.description: The ID of the backend system that is used to resolve the IDs.

request_samples.name: JSON
request_samples.sample:
{
  "DisableEventExports": true,
  "LoyaltyPrograms": [
    {
      "AllowUnsubscribeBy": 2,
      "ApplyManuallyOnly": true,
      "AutoSubscribeCustomer": true,
      "Budget": 123.456,
      "BudgetCurrencyID": "string",
      "Conditions": [
        {
          "Data": {
            "key": "any valid json value"
          },
          "ID": "string",
          "Type": "string"
        }
      ],
      "Data": "any valid json value",
      "DeactivateWhenBudgetIsReached": true,
      "Description": "string",
      "EndDate": "2024-11-07",
      "Handler": "string",
      "ID": "string",
      "LoyaltyPointUsageOptions": 1,
      "LoyaltyProgramGroupID": "string",
      "Name": "string",
      "Options": 4,

        {
          "ConfirmationRequired": true,
          "Enabled": true,
          "Hidden": true,
          "OrganizationUnitSetID": "string",
          "SubscriptionConfirmation": 1
        }
      ],

        {
          "AllowPartialPayment": true,
          "Budget": 123.456,

          "MaximumAmountPerOrder": 123.456,
          "MaximumPercentageOfUserBudgetPerOrder": 123,

            "Filters": {

                "ExactMatch": true,

                "IncludeMissing": true,

                "To": "string",
                "Values": [
                  "any valid json value"
                ]
              }
            },
            "OverallQuantityLimitPerOrder": 123,
            "OverallQuantityLimitPerUser": 123,
            "ProductIDs": [
              "string"
            ],
            "ProductSearchID": "string",
            "QuantityLimitPerOrder": 123,
            "QuantityLimitPerUser": 123
          },
          "Required": true,
          "Sequence": 123,
          "TaxHandling": 1,
          "UserBudget": 123.456,
          "UserBudgetDeduction": 2,
          "UserMaximumUsage": 123
        }
      ],
      "PointAwardingRules": [
        {
          "ApplyRecursive": true,
          "Conditions": [
            {
              "Data": {},
              "ID": "string",
              "Type": "ORDERAMOUNT"
            }
          ],
          "Description": "string",
          "Enabled": true,
          "EndDate": "2024-11-07",
          "ID": "string",
          "MarketingDescription": "string",
          "Name": "string",
          "OrganizationUnitSetID": "string",
          "PointExpirationPolicyData": "any valid json value",
          "PointExpirationPolicyType": "string",
          "PointPendingPolicyData": "any valid json value",
          "PointPendingPolicyType": "string",
          "PointsToAward": 123,
          "StartDate": "2024-11-07"
        }
      ],
      "PointExpirationPolicyData": {
        "key": "any valid json value"
      },
      "PointExpirationPolicyType": "string",
      "PointPendingPolicyData": {
        "key": "any valid json value"
      },
      "PointPendingPolicyType": "string",
      "PriceLists": [
        "string"
      ],
      "ProductLimitations": [
        {
          "ApplyToPriceList": true,
          "Filters": {
            "key": {
              "ExactMatch": true,
              "From": "string",
              "IncludeMissing": true,
              "Negation": true,
              "To": "string",
              "Values": [
                "any valid json value"
              ]
            }
          },
          "ID": "string",
          "Name": "string",
          "OverallQuantityLimitPerOrder": 123,
          "OverallQuantityLimitPerUser": 123,
          "ProductIDs": [
            "string"
          ],
          "ProductSearchID": "string",
          "QuantityLimitPerOrder": 123,
          "QuantityLimitPerUser": 123
        }
      ],
      "ReactivateProgramWhenPossible": true,
      "ReloadPolicy": "string",
      "RequireCustomer": true,
      "RequireManualUserIdentifier": true,
      "RequiredCustomFields": [
        "string"
      ],
      "RequiresSubscribedCustomer": true,
      "RequiresSubscriptionValidation": true,
      "ResubscribeHandling": 2,
      "StartDate": "2024-11-07",
      "Status": 1,
      "UserBudget": 123.456,
      "UserIdentifierPrefix": "string",
      "UserIdentifierStartNumber": 123,
      "UserIdentifierSuffix": "string",
      "UserMaximumUsage": 123
    }
  ]
}

request_samples.sample:

      },

      ],
      "ProductLimitations": [

D.name: ID
D.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgramCondition`

E.name: ConfirmationRequired
E.deprecation_notice:
**Deprecated since 761:** ConfirmationRequired is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.793: This property has been replaced by SubscriptionConfirmation.

**Will be removed in 777**
E.description:
While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

**Deprecated since 761:** ConfirmationRequired is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.793: This property has been replaced by SubscriptionConfirmation.

**Will be removed in 777**

E.name: SubscriptionConfirmation
E.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Email
* `2` - Webhook

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

G.name: OverallQuantityLimitPerOrder
G.description: The quantity limit over the entire product limitation product set per order.

G.name: OverallQuantityLimitPerUser
G.description: The quantity limit over the entire product limitation product set per user.

G.name: ProductIDs
G.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

G.name: ProductSearchID
G.description: This is the ID of a `ProductSearchTemplate`

G.name: QuantityLimitPerOrder
G.description: The quantity limit per product within the product limitation product set per order.

G.name: QuantityLimitPerUser
G.description: The quantity limit per product within the product limitation product set per user.

F.name: ID
F.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgramPaymentType`

F.name: PaymentTypeID
F.description: This is the ID of a `PaymentType`

F.name: UserBudgetDeduction
F.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Program
* `2` - PaymentMethod
* `3` - Both

O.name: ProductIDs
O.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

S.name: DateTimeValue
S.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

S.name: NumberValue
S.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

S.name: StringValue
S.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

R.name: Operator
R.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Equals
* `1` - NotEquals
* `2` - LowerThan
* `3` - LowerThanOrEqualTo
* `4` - HigherThanOrEqualTo
* `5` - HigherThan
* `7` - Contains
* `8` - DoesNotContain
* `9` - StartsWith
* `10` - DoesNotStartWith
* `11` - EndsWith
* `12` - DoesNotEndWith
* `13` - HasValue
* `14` - DoesntHaveValue

J.name: ID
J.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 255 (incl) characters long.

I.name: ID
I.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 255 (incl) characters long.

I.name: MarketingDescription
I.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 200 (incl) characters long.

I.name: Name
I.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 127 (incl) characters long.

I.name: OrganizationUnitSetID
I.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnitSet`

U.name: ProductIDs
U.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

U.name: ProductSearchID
U.description: This is the ID of a `ProductSearchTemplate`

C.name: AllowUnsubscribeBy
C.description:
Indicates if the subscription can be unsubscribed and if so, who can do the unsubscribe.
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Subscriber
* `2` - Employee
* `3` - All

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: ApplyManuallyOnly
C.deprecation_notice:
**Deprecated since 754:** ApplyManuallyOnly is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.786: Loyalty programs should always be applied manually. Property will be removed. Given values will be ignored..

**Will be removed in 770**
C.description:
**Deprecated since 754:** ApplyManuallyOnly is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.786: Loyalty programs should always be applied manually. Property will be removed. Given values will be ignored..

**Will be removed in 770**

C.name: AutoSubscribeCustomer
C.description:
When true, if a non anonymous customer is attached to the order they will be automatically subscribed on finishing the order.
When false, the customer will not be subscribed.

This is ignore when`RequiresSubscribedCustomer` or `RequiresSubscriptionValidation` is set to true.

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

C.name: Budget
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: BudgetCurrencyID
C.description:
This is the ID of a `Currency`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: Data
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: Description
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: EndDate
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: Handler
C.description: While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

C.name: ID
C.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgram`

C.name: LoyaltyPointUsageOptions
C.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - AllowAwarding
* `2` - UsableAsPaymentMethod
* `4` - UsableForWithdraw

C.name: LoyaltyProgramGroupID
C.description:
This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgramGroup`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: Name
C.description: While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

C.name: Options
C.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - EnablePaymentMethods
* `2` - EnableLoyaltyPoints
* `4` - EnableDiscounts

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

C.name: PointExpirationPolicyData
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: PointExpirationPolicyType
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: PointPendingPolicyData
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: PointPendingPolicyType
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: PriceLists
C.description: This is the ID of a `PriceList`

C.name: ReloadPolicy
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: RequireCustomer
C.description:
When true, the loyalty program will only be applied when a customer is attached to the order.

When false, the loyalty program can be attached to the order even if there is no customer attached.

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

C.name: RequireManualUserIdentifier
C.description:
When set to true, subscribing the user will require a UserIdentifier to be given.
Attention!
This value will be used to create a subscription when either `RequiredCustomer` or `AutoSubscribeCustomer` is set to true.
When this is not the case on create, this can be introduced on update. This value cannot be changed after it is set in either the create or update.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: RequiresSubscribedCustomer
C.description:
When true, the loyalty program will only be applied when a customer is attached to the order that is already subscribed to the loyalty program.
Also, this will make the `RequireCustomer` automatically true and `AutoSubscribeCustomer` false.

When false, the loyalty program can be attached to the order if a customer is attached that isn't already subscribed to the loyalty program.

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

C.name: RequiresSubscriptionValidation
C.description:
When true, the order will require that the attached customer on the order will be validated by providing the UserIdentifier in the `AttachBenefitProgramToOrder` service.
Also, this will make the `RequireCustomer` and `RequiresSubscribedCustomer` automatically true and `AutoSubscribeCustomer` false.

When false, this validation isn't required.

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

C.name: ResubscribeHandling
C.description:
Handling when a user is unsubscribed and re-subscribes.
Possible values:

* `0` - UpdateUserIdentifier
* `1` - KeepOriginalUserIdentifier
* `2` - Block

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: StartDate
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: Status
C.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Inactive
* `1` - Active

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

C.name: UserBudget
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: UserIdentifierPrefix
C.description:
Attention!
This value will be used to create a subscription when either `RequiredCustomer` or `AutoSubscribeCustomer` is set to true.
When this is not the case on create, this can be introduced on update. This value cannot be changed after it is set in either the create or update.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: UserIdentifierStartNumber
C.description:
Attention!
This value will be used to create a subscription when either `RequiredCustomer` or `AutoSubscribeCustomer` is set to true.
When this is not the case on create, this can be introduced on update. This value cannot be changed after it is set in either the create or update.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: UserIdentifierSuffix
C.description:
Attention!
This value will be used to create a subscription when either `RequiredCustomer` or `AutoSubscribeCustomer` is set to true.
When this is not the case on create, this can be introduced on update. This value cannot be changed after it is set in either the create or update.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

C.name: UserMaximumUsage
C.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: DisableEventExports
B.description: Enabling this will try to suppress as many event exports as possible that might result from this call.

W.name: Code
W.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

W.name: Message
W.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

W.name: RequestID
W.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

W.name: Type
W.description: A short description of the error type.

X.name: ExternalIDs
X.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

X.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
X.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

X.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
X.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
